itemDescription: British zoologist and museum curator in Karachi

wikipedia_page.main: James Alexander Murray (fl. 1841-1893) was a British zoologist, taxidermist, and museum curator in Karachi. He published several books including one on the edible birds of India and founded the Victoria Natural History Institute at Bombay but went bankrupt, was imprisoned, and died in obscurity.

response: * James A. Murray (zoologist) (fl. 1880s), zoologist and museum curator in Karachi
* Mr. James A. Murray, Karachi Museum
James A. Murray may refer to:
* James A. Murray (zoologist), zoologist and museum curator in Karachi
*  James A. Murray, uncle and mentor of U.S. Senator James E. Murray
